attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is the WORST on the app store. It hacked my phone and deleted some of my apps and hacked my social media to say Trump 2020!!! No longer supporting this evil man who is taking away my TikTok!!! DO NOT SUPPORT!!! #KANYE2020

attributes.title: help me
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and now men dressed in black tuxedos are chasing me with peaches saying they’ll put me in a peach?!?!! Also this app gave me 420 different types of viruses 💔✨

attributes.title: Horrendous App
attributes.review: Quite literally a horrendous app with zero applicable content. It takes too long to operate, worthless, and devoid of any merit. Perhaps it is a digital manifestation of Trump’s IQ.

attributes.title: Horrible App😣
attributes.review: This App Took So Long To Download And Once It Finally Did The App Was All Glitchy And I Got Hacked Within An Hour Of Having The App. I DO NOT Recommend

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This app is terrible. The app promotes racism, homophobia, misogyny, xenophobia and so much more. It’s no bueno for the American consumer. The app and it’s creator also heavily targets marginalized groups.  I advise against downloading this app.
